description: Daria Tomenko discovers a dormant legacy protocol tied to Halden's authority, with mounting pressure from her division to address unexplained system irregularities.

After weighing risks and recalling her brother's disappearance, Daria privately decides to activate Halden's protocol, believing controlled Council guidance will restore order better than public exposure.
The protocol quietly launches: agenda-driven, predictive messages signed by "Halden" reach each Council member, synchronizing with their daily briefings and policy agendas.

Council analysts realize the new briefings align eerily with internal debates, using Halden’s thought patterns. Confusion splinters the Council between those trusting the messages and those suspecting manipulation.

Citizens notice citywide BCI score instability and spread rumors of the system acting on its own. Protests erupt, with groups demanding transparency over BCI algorithms and Halden's records, fearing a loss of human control.
